hero_description: Find your career path with personalized guidance, skill development, and local opportunities designed for rural youth.
features_description: Our platform offers personalized guidance to help rural youth discover and pursue meaningful career pathways.
feature1_desc: Identify your strengths and career interests through our personalized assessment tools.
feature2_desc: Access tailored resources for developing the skills you need for your chosen path.
feature3_desc: Explore various career paths based on your unique background and location.
feature4_desc: Find relevant government schemes, exams, and job opportunities in your region.
testimonial1_quote: This platform helped me discover my passion for agriculture technology. Now I'm studying agricultural engineering while helping my family farm.
testimonial2_quote: I never thought I could work in healthcare without leaving my village. The skill development resources connected me to a telemedicine training program.
testimonial3_quote: Thanks to the scholarship information I found here, I was able to apply for and receive funding for my education in sustainable development.
footer_tagline: Empowering rural youth to discover and pursue career opportunities.

pathways.heading: Your Career Pathways
pathways.subheading: Based on your assessment, we've identified these career paths that match your interests, skills, and location.

agriculture.title: Sustainable Agriculture
agriculture.description: Combine traditional farming knowledge with modern sustainable practices.
agriculture.education: Certificate in Sustainable Agriculture or on-farm training programs

healthcare.title: Rural Healthcare Support
healthcare.description: Provide essential healthcare services in rural communities.
healthcare.education: ASHA Worker Training or Rural Medical Practitioner Certificate

education.title: Rural Education Services
education.description: Support education in rural communities through teaching and tutoring.
education.education: D.El.Ed (Diploma in Elementary Education) or B.Ed

tourism.title: Rural Tourism & Hospitality
tourism.description: Develop and promote tourism opportunities in rural areas.
tourism.education: Certificate in Tourism and Hospitality or on-job training

skills.heading: Skill Development Resources
skills.subheading: Find training programs, courses, and workshops to develop the skills you need for your chosen career path.
skills.searchPlaceholder: Search for skills, providers, or categories...
skills.noResults: No resources found matching your search criteria.

agri1.title: Organic Farming Certification
agri1.desc: Learn the fundamentals of sustainable cultivation without synthetic chemicals.
agri1.details: This course introduces soil preparation, composting, crop rotation, and natural pest control techniques to build healthy agricultural practices.

agri2.title: Water Conservation Techniques
agri2.desc: Understand efficient irrigation and water conservation techniques.
agri2.details: Covers rainwater harvesting, drip irrigation systems, watershed management, and improving water use efficiency for sustainable farming.

health1.title: Rural Health Assistant Program
health1.desc: Support local health needs and assist medical workers.
health1.details: Learn basic healthcare guidance, first aid, maternal care support, vaccination awareness, and rural health communication skills.

edu1.title: D.El.Ed (Diploma in Elementary Education)
edu1.desc: Become a supportive learning guide in schools or community centers.
edu1.details: Includes classroom support skills, lesson planning, child psychology basics, communication methods, and student development assistance.

tech1.title: Basic Digital Literacy
tech1.desc: Learn essential computer and internet usage skills.
tech1.details: Teaches operating computers, typing, using the internet, email communication, online safety, and basic office software skills.

tour1.title: Rural Tourism & Hospitality
tour1.desc: Introduction to hosting, guiding, and guest service skills.
tour1.details: Covers cultural sensitivity, guest service communication, local tourism promotion, and assisting in travel or lodging services.

TermsIntro: Welcome to NextRural! By using our website and services, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
Section1Text: You agree to use NextRural for educational and career guidance purposes only. Misuse or unauthorized access may result in account suspension.
Section2Text: You are responsible for the accuracy of the information you provide. Please do not share your login credentials with others.
Section3Text: We respect your privacy. Your data will be used only to enhance your learning and career recommendations as described in our Privacy Policy.
Section4Text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.
PrivacyIntro: At NextRural, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
Section1TextP: We collect information such as your name, email, age, education, and preferences to personalize your experience on the platform.
Section2TextP: Your data helps us provide better career guidance, recommendations, and skill development resources tailored to your background and interests.
Section3TextP: We use encryption and secure servers to protect your personal information. Your data will never be sold or shared with third parties without your consent.
Section4TextP: You can access, update, or delete your information anytime by contacting our support team. You also have the right to withdraw consent for data usage.
